mapper.insert:
select notice_seq.nextval from dual
insert into notice(notice_no, member_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_regdate, notice_readcount, notice_groupNo, notice_step, notice_sort, notice_fileName, notice_fileSize, notice_downcount, notice_originalname) values(#{noticeNo}, #{memberId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, sysdate, 0, #{noticeNo}, 0, 0, #{noticeFilename}, #{noticeFilesize}, 0, #{noticeOriginalname})
mapper.update: update notice set notice_readcount=notice_readcount+1 where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
